public static class RowFilters.EqualsFilter
extends org.jdesktop.swingx.sort.RowFilters.GeneralFilter

EqualsFilter filters against a single match value by equals.

RowFilters.EqualsFilter

public RowFilters.EqualsFilter(java.lang.Object matchValue,
                               int... columns)
Instantiates an EqualsFilter with single match value on the given columns.

Parameters:
matchValue - the matchValue to compare against
columns - the indices of the values to check. If not supplied all values are evaluated
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if compareValue is null
